channel.title: ScGorilla - 18 + Adult Only - 525 PK
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8rQ3v0a.png[/img][/center]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/N0vgcNx.gif[/img][b]Our Goals:[/b] Primarily ScGorilla intends to make different gear and combative tactics result in endless creative PKing. Secondary goal, a more personal one, is to have regular weekly updates to the aforementioned.
Client Download is located near the bottom of the post.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/N0vgcNx.gif[/img][b]What to do: [/b] You're given the levels for the class you pick and the only skill you train is on how you want to kill people. To PK simply choose your place of battle. WILD: Adventure into the wilderness with teleports that get you deep into the action. FUN: Pull the lever to the Fun Area to kill others for (300+)random drops without the risk of your best items!
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8u4C5u8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/moAp7bV.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XIWiag5.png[/img]
[u]TL;DR:[/u] Choose your class, get your levels, get your items and get PKing.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/N0vgcNx.gif[/img][b]Details:[/b] -Start with level 90s and unique Class loadout of items -4 Classes, with 3 more planned for next update -508 base used for Graphics -PKing resembles Runescape 2007 -No custom client/items -Updated and maintained by the programmer of RoonScape (2008-2012) -Intricate and Unique Combat based server -Forums -Dedicated Hosting
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/N0vgcNx.gif[/img][b]Forums & Client:[/b] [center][url=http://www.scgorilla.com]www.ScGorilla.com[/url][/center] [center][url=http://uppit.com/rmh7xlswonmk/ScGorilla_Client.rar]Client[/url] Client is 60mb, we realise this is large but you need to download the cache[/center]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qtbG9BL.png[/img]
Hope to meet you online the server or forums :) Also I need some pictures of people playing ASAP to post on them on this advertisment!
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/nmY5VVe.png[/img]

item.title: ScGorilla - 18 + Adult Only - 525 PK
item.dc:creator: @1v1aul 1v1aul
item.description:
@1v1aul wrote:

-Update
Fixed many items animation, requirements and stats, that being said, there is lots more fixes and edits to be done to them.
Also reworked combat to allow for oldschool comboing.
Added 10 more fun drops to the mix
Added damaged books + pages
Fixed weapon/armour issues with not equiping
Added rune defender
Added new fun points shop
New mage system supporting a more balanced combat matrix by using staffs(i.e. zammy staff) that can autocast a certain spell on equip.
God staffs auto-cast now as a result to the mage update.
Different mage staffs to try. Mystic steam, mud and many more!

Read full topic

item.title: ScGorilla - 18 + Adult Only - 525 PK
item.dc:creator: @Pyro Pyro
item.description:
@Pyro wrote:

[quote=“Lil_Smok3r, post:4, topic:524845”]No pics no clicks…

But, looking at the video Pyro posted, it looks good.
Good luck.[/quote]
[b]
I am not sure where you are pulling that info from o_o? There are pictures, and I will provide a few bank pics on this post. It has 80+ DL’s from the uppit alone. We are a fairly new server, but have lots of experience, expect big things soon.
I have gotten around 300+ Kills on the server so far. Here is a small portion of my bank, and the items you can get from the FunPK zone (Wizard Hats\Potions aren’t from it).

There is a wide array of Mystic, Barrows, Weapons, Misc “family” favorite items, and much more. There is also God swords, claws, etc. These are rarer drops in order to create\build an economy, and not have everyone running around with overpowered weapons. Regardless, the DDS can hold its own against them.

Here is another bank taken from our bank pic thread on the forums.

[/b]

Read full topic

@Pyro wrote:

[b]Great server, great PK’ing, can’t wait to see more from this.

I think everyone should at-least give this server a try, you will not regret it

Here is a PK’ing video made from a player of the server (He plans on making better ones in the future)[/b]

item.title: ScGorilla - 18 + Adult Only - 525 PK
item.dc:creator: @1v1aul 1v1aul
item.description:
@1v1aul wrote:

[center][/center]

Our Goals:
Primarily ScGorilla intends to make different gear and combative tactics result in endless creative PKing.
Secondary goal, a more personal one, is to have regular weekly updates to the aforementioned.

Client Download is located near the bottom of the post.

What to do:
You’re given the levels for the class you pick and the only skill you train is on how you want to kill people.
To PK simply choose your place of battle.
WILD: Adventure into the wilderness with teleports that get you deep into the action.
FUN: Pull the lever to the Fun Area to kill others for (300+)random drops without the risk of your best items!



XIWiag5.png820×210

TL;DR:
Choose your class, get your levels, get your items and get PKing.

Details:
-Start with level 90s and unique Class loadout of items
-4 Classes, with 3 more planned for next update
-508 base used for Graphics
-PKing resembles Runescape 2007
-No custom client/items
-Updated and maintained by the programmer of RoonScape (2008-2012)
-Intricate and Unique Combat based server
-Forums
-Dedicated Hosting

Forums & Client:
[center]www.ScGorilla.com[/center]
[center]Client
Client is 60mb, we realise this is large but you need to download the cache[/center]

Hope to meet you online the server or forums
Also I need some pictures of people playing ASAP to post on them on this advertisment!
